author: William Feuer
title: Worldwide coronavirus cases reach 1 million, doubling in a week as death toll tops 50,000
description: The virus threatens to spread widely across Africa, where several countries have seen hundreds of positive tests, according to Johns Hopkins University.
content:
Reported COVID-19 cases around the world surpassed 1 million on Thursday, doubling in a week as the virus spreads across Europe and North America and establishes a toehold in Africa. 
Just before global cases reached 1 million, the COVID-19 worldwide death t… [+1793 chars]
